name: mythically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that exists only in stories: The tiger is a mythically powerful symbol in literature. The author has created a mythically noble character.
in a way that is imaginary or not real: Their idea of their country was of a mythically benevolent place that never really existed. They mistakenly and mythically concluded that people could not distinguish between fiction and non-fiction.
More examplesFewer examplesMythically, the river was believed to be connected to the sky.It is an ancient and mythically beautiful town.His relaxed management style is the complete opposite of the mythically aggressive company boss.
